ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:50:27 [Issue ID 4000-819882] urn:comicvine:4000-819882 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:52:02. [Issue ID 2170963]
ComicInfo.Summary: As the heroes gather to determine how to use Cyborg's blood to cure those inflicted with the anti-life virus, Professor Ivo launches an army of Amazos to kill those infected before they can be cured. Meanwhile, Zatanna discovers that Constantine is working behind the scenes using questionable methods to help the heroes.
